channel.title: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!
channel.description: ok so i asked him to buy a site that he had and so i did for $15 he also said he would offer me complete help when ever i needed. so after he sends me it i get it and then on msn he says gtg and logs off rite away and has yet to be on. and he wont reply to any of my messages on here even though hes on so reply back i vain i becuase i want my money back and you can have this site back i dont want it.

item.title: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Locked. You are both wrong. BUT, vain did give you what he said and he is providing help for you now. He doesn’t owe you a refund in any way. However, this is why we don’t allow buying and selling of anything on these forums. It is way to much drama.

Locked.

Read full topic
item.source: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!

item.title: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!

item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

I Vain I:

I will help you if you fucking ask for help. God damn. Stop saying I’m a scammer and ask for help. PM me on MSN or here.

Vain never offer help to an idiot like him

item.source: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!

item.title: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=479837.msg3513097#msg3513097 date=1298747183]
Vain, you said you’d help him with the site (look at the MSN logs he provided).
…and you didn’t. So even though he got what he paid for, you still didn’t follow through with everything you said you’d do.
[/quote]He never asked for help. He immediately called me a scammer.

He never once messaged me on here, or msn asking for help. Only for refunds because “they don’t work” when it’s his problem for not editting the css[/quote]

just give him his money back and squash it, your making a worse rep for yourself scammer

Read full topic
item.source: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!

item.title: I Vain I is a scammer heres proof!
item.dc:creator: @ladesman ladesman
item.description:
@ladesman wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=ladesman link=topic=479837.msg3513102#msg3513102 date=1298747360]

I’m not giving you a refund for your stupidity. You purchased it, you keep it.

ok way to be a dik alright well u also said u would help me with my highscores so lets go i need the help come on msn

and also all the people with the 200 rep are off course all on vains side
[/quote]I’m a dick? Hahahahaha. You’re the one who called me a scammer because you couldn’t edit css.

For the highscores, either follow Deathschaos9’s tutorial on setting them up via Xxamp, or connect it to your database/add the server side queries yourself.

[quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=479837.msg3513097#msg3513097 date=1298747183]
Vain, you said you’d help him with the site (look at the MSN logs he provided).
…and you didn’t. So even though he got what he paid for, you still didn’t follow through with everything you said you’d do.
[/quote]He never asked for help. He immediately called me a scammer.

He never once messaged me on here, or msn asking for help. Only for refunds because “they don’t work” when it’s his problem for not editting the css[/quote]

om no you have to help with the highscores as that is what u said you would and part of what i payed for

and yes at the very last part of the msn i asked for help but u have yet to logged on to see that and i alsooo did send u a message on here

Read full topic
